Schedule Advising Appointments through OneDePaul. Bio and Research Information Anthony Chung received the Ph.D. degree in Computer Science from the University of Maryland, Baltimore County in 1992. His B.S. and M.S. degrees in Computer Science are from Oregon State University and Iowa State University respectively. He is currently an Associate Professor at CDM, and has been a full time faculty since 1992. His research interests include computer communication networks and network security. Research Area Networking, Security Specific Research Area Formal methods in protocol development.
